articles.title: Serum Institute of India Ships First R21/Matrix-M Malaria Vaccine Doses to Africa - European Pharmaceutical Manufacturer
articles.description: Serum Institute of India marks a significant milestone with the shipment of its first set of R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine to Africa.
articles.content: Serum Institute of India marks a significant milestone with the shipment of its first set of R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine to Africa. The initial shipment will be sent to the Central African Republic … [+4103 chars]

articles.title: Social Media Flooded With Videos of a Dramatic Fireball Over Spain and Portugal - IGN
articles.description: The European Space Agency’s Planetary Defence Office is investigating the appearance of an enormous fireball that lit up the sky above Spain and Portugal late last week.

articles.title: Meteor streaks across the sky over Spain and Portugal - CGTN
articles.description: A glorious shooting star whizzed across the night sky above Spain and Portugal over the weekend. The European Space Agency said its Planetary Defense Office is "currently analyzing the size and trajectory of the object to assess the chance
